subtitle: Capture the freshness of these summer vegetables that lend themselves so well to being steamed.

method.text: Bring a pan of lightly salted water to the boil. Add potatoes. Cover with a metal colander or steamer with the carrots in. Cover and cook for 5 min.
Add the courgettes to the colander or steamer and cook for 5-8 min until the vegetables are tender.
Drain well. Spoon onto a warmed serving dish.

title: Mixed steamed vegetables
